South Auckland truck crash: Widow of dead driver Uili Fa’aofo was supposed to be in van https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/south-auckland-truck-crash-widow-of-dead-driver-uili-faaofo-was-supposed-to-be-in-van/2MOD2SWDTJGZJPYENXUQW2U4QE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/south-auckland-truck-crash-widow-of-dead-driver-uili-faaofo-was-supposed-to-be-in-van/2MOD2SWDTJGZJPYENXUQW2U4QE/ Raphael FranksNu'ulua Fa'aofo reveals she was to be in the van when it was hit. She canceled her trip. Wed, 28 Aug 2024 06:03:17 +0000 Three people died after the crash on State Highway 1 on Monday morning. They were Fa’aofo Uili Fa’aofo, 45, Leauga Jerry Leauga, 37, and Ta’avao Kelemete, 32.
